SELECT_FILE_FORMAT_CSV.message: Export birthdays as a CSV file.
SELECT_FILE_FORMAT_CSV.description: Label for CSV file type radio button

FILE_FORMAT_CSV_DESCRIPTION.message:
CSV file format used by Microsoft Excel or Google Sheets.

DO NOT USE it to import birthdays to a calendar; ICS format is preferable.
